name: places/ChIJic-TdqtZwokREVygGvUUCwM
adrFormatAddress: 1407 Broadway #700, New York, NY 10018, USA

originalText.text: I have been very impressed with Winston Shih's professionalism and attentiveness to detail.  It has been a pleasure dealing with him and the GogoTech Team.

text.text: I have been very impressed with Winston Shih's professionalism and attentiveness to detail.  It has been a pleasure dealing with him and the GogoTech Team.

originalText.text: I have no words to describe how horrible it is working for this company. To start the new CEO Ritesh Chaturbedi is genuinely the worst person I have worked for and is so corrupt and has no idea what he’s doing. He bankrupted the whole company along side his best friend Len Yampolsky who basically runs the company for him (obviously doing a horrible job) . In real time while the company is falling apart he’s in Nepal on vacation because he’s too much of a coward to face everyone in the office. Winston Shih he is the biggest snake and a follower, he has no idea what hes doing but continues to bankrupt the company. No one respects any of them and they’re both the biggest jokes and don’t take accountability for anything. They pass blame to everyone around them. Meanwhile the board is just letting this happen. It is extremely strict, no company outings, no company dinners, nothing fun just strict work. It is an extreme mess so trust me do not work here it is not worth the emotional distress everyday. And they refuse to pay their workers what they deserve and steal their commission. Overall do not recommend at all. Work anywhere else but here. .

originalText.text:
On 04/08/20 I ordered a telscopic fishing pole.  It arrived timely 04/14/20, but it was missing 3 pieces.  I have tried to call this company several times no answer..  I placed a dispute with my credit card.

This review represents my initial assessment. It could change for the better should they improve their customer service and yes I know we are in the midst of a pandemic; however, they've had poor ratings before the pandemic.

originalText.text: Only gave them 1 star because it won't let you give a ZERO!!! My husband ordered a part through customer service. He gave them exact description AND a part number. It was a 7 pin  to 9 pin reducer cable. The packing slip had the correct description but that is NOT what we received. They only refunded partial payment. VERY UNHAPPY. BUYERS BEWARE!!

text.text: Only gave them 1 star because it won't let you give a ZERO!!! My husband ordered a part through customer service. He gave them exact description AND a part number. It was a 7 pin  to 9 pin reducer cable. The packing slip had the correct description but that is NOT what we received. They only refunded partial payment. VERY UNHAPPY. BUYERS BEWARE!!

originalText.text: This has been a nightmare!   It took 1.5 months to receive most of my order when the items were "in stock" according to the website.   Part of the order was not included even though the packing slip says otherwise.   Numerous phone calls make no difference in getting the issue resolved.  I do NOT recommend this company.  They do not deserve a one star rating.
